title: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
Be the change you wish to see in the world.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
description: A statement emphasizing the value of creative thinking over rote memorization and facts.
A call to action to create positive change by leading by example.
A recognition of the importance of creativity and risk-taking in driving progress and success.
A call for non-violent resistance and a belief in the power of love and compassion to overcome hatred and oppression.
